front.title: Issues of the Key Management Mobility Capability (K) flag in Mobile IPv6.

abstract.t: Mobile IPv6 specification (RFC 3775) introduces a flag called "Key Management Mobility Capability (K)" that is used during home registration procedure. This document describes the behavior of implementations when the capability is supported or not. The purpose of this description is to highlight the expected behavior of implementations at the end of home registration process with regards to the exchanged (K) flag value.
